name: Bootstrap Illustrator
body:
### Quickly create Bootstrap layouts in Illustrator.
This is an Illustrator file containing the basic Twitter Bootstrap design elements. It's a work in progress, so there are still some elements missing. 

**Love it, hate it? Let me know:** @creategery 

Download it here: [Illustrator Bootstrap](https://github.com/creategery/bootstrap-illustrator/archive/master.zip)

### Preview
![Twitter Bootstrap Illustrator file](http://f.cl.ly/items/0w3I113g1V2X2I2e2A0v/Twitter-Bootstrap.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
